```{r}
library(ade4)
library(tidyverse)
library(mice)

set.seed(197273)
data_dragon <- read_csv("dragons.csv")
dragons_mice <- mice(data_dragon, method = "rf")
data_dragon <- complete(dragons_mice)

dragon_pca <- dudi.pca(data_dragon %>% select(-c(ID, Species)),
                     scannf = FALSE, # ne pas générer de graphique
                     scale = TRUE)
fact_spec <- as.factor(data_dragon$Species)
dragon_lda <- ade4::discrimin(dudi = dragon_pca,
                      fac = fact_spec,
                      scannf = FALSE)
plot(dragon_lda)
```
